issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: We have several "map modes" (where following the current location is just one) in our app, so we would like our own "buttons" for these, while still showing the current location on the map. Suggestion: new property enableMyLocationControl: Boolean (default: true) in Modules.Map.View that decides visibility of the "My location" button rather than userLocation property. If you want backwards compability, it should only have effect when userLocation is true. In my case, I would then set userLocation = true and enableMyLocationControl = false.
fields.summary: Allow user location to be shown in Google Maps V2 module without the built-in "My Location" button

comments.body: This issue should be resolved now, with the new userLocationButton property behaving as I suggested here.
